com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.conversion.util

Class ConvertingList<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.conversion.util.ConvertingCollection<T>
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.conversion.util.ConvertingList<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - exposed type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<T>, java.util.Collection<T>, java.util.List<T>

    public class ConvertingList<T>
extends ConvertingCollection<T>
implements java.util.List<T>
    Wraps around another list of unknown contents and performs conversions automatically. This can be used to interact with collections that require additional element conversion.
